Text.Page:
We've lost a large shipment of gold crests recently, and I suspect the Black Claws are behind it. Could be beasties, though, so check them, too.

Kill {@LinkCreature:41#3002#lurching cullars}, {@LinkCreature:41#3003#rapacious cullars}, and {@LinkCreature:41#2004#Black Claw fighters} and {@LinkCreature:41#2005#raiders} in northern Feral Valley.

You can deliver the crests to Jeulile at Feral Valley Station.
We're safer now, and you recovered the seed wealth we'll need to transform this region. Thank you, <PCNAME>.
We need those crests, <PCNAME>. It takes more than hopes to build a future.
